nodes.text: The Scyre territory was the living area of the Scyre clan on the planet Parnassos. The territory consisted of mostly spires of black rock, cliffs, ledges, and caves, bordered on one side by a sea and the other by Claw territory. Within their territory, the members of the Scyre would get from place to place either through a series of ziplines, rope bridges, tethers, nets, or hammocks.
